title: State.of.Play.1080p.AC3(DD).5.1ch.Blu-ray.PS3-TEAM
description:
*******Bricktop HD for PS3*********  

               This is meant for playback on **PS3**
Tested on Sony Playstation 3 (Firmware 3.0) with a large screen HDTV                
                ## This file will play on a ##
     ##-PC-## With PowerDvD,VLC Media Player,
     ##-MAC-## using roxio toast video player 3.0 
     ##-X-Box-360-## releases do work if you're running windows 7 and streaming                            on the network through windows media center. 

This file is kept under 4 gigs for easy storage (Dang FAT32!)
Hi quality 2-pass H.264 standard encoding



State of play (2009)

A team of investigative reporters work alongside a police detective to try to solve the murder of a congressman's mistress



Codec..........: H.264
Resolution.....: 1920x1080
Bitrate........: 4.0 Mbps
Framerate......: 24fps
Audio..........: AC3 Dolby Digital 5.1CH Surround (448Kbs)
Subtitles......: None
Extension......: M2TS


Please if you like the movie PLEASE SEED it so others can enjoy it to.
